summary: The Cellphone Jamming Reform Act of 2025 aims to allow state and federal correctional facilities to use cell phone jamming equipment. The bill defines "jamming system" and clarifies that the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) cannot prevent correctional facilities from using such systems to block wireless communication to, from, or within the facility.  The bill includes requirements such as restricting operation to housing facilities, funding responsibilities, and mandatory consultation with local authorities.
